title: Resolving Anger in Your Marriage, Part 7
itunes:author: John Fuller & Greg Smalley
itunes:summary:
Overcoming anger can lead to a beautiful marriage. John talks with Greg about how anger must be dealt with at a personal level before it's solved in a marriage.

Receive Ted Cunningham's book From Anger to Intimacy for your donation of any amount!
